ygData.messageBody:
Welcome to the Shadow Knights Mailing List!
-=Support Evil Role Playing=-

To send messaged to the mailing list send to:
shadowknight@onelist.com
To send a private message to the list owner send
to: david1ap@...

Thanks!
List owner,
Aminal (aka Bayln)
(I play as Bayln in the PVP server)

--
Its me the one, the only, AMINAL!
"If cows had brains, would I?", Aminal
